name: Ready Action Driver
description:
A multiplayer Tron like game inspired by classic arcade games or old.  The goal of the game is simple, have the opponent run into your trail. the players will have a boost and a shield function to help each player.  Controllers are recommended for this game but not needed. 

Controls (non controller)

W/up arrow: Boost

S/down arrow: Sheild

A&D / Left & Right Arrow:  Turn
